title: What were the Wimbledon results?
description: Wimbledon continued on Wednesday when Carlos Alcaraz continued his quest for a three-peat at the grass-court major. The Spaniard ousted Briton Oliver Tarvet, ending the qualifier's dream run. Fifth seed Taylor Fritz overcame a big server for the second consecutive match, escaping Gabriel Diallo in five sets. Fritz's countryman Frances Tiafoe fell to Cameron Norrie in four sets. View some of Wednesday's key results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores. Centre Court Aryna Sabalenka d. Marie Bouzkova (CZE) 7-6(4), 6-4 Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d. Oliver Tarvet (GBR) 6-1, 6-4, 6-4 Emma Raducanu (GBR) d. Marketa Vondrousova (CZE) 6-3, 6-3 No. 1 Court Cameron Norrie (GBR) d. Frances Tiafoe (USA) 4-6, 6-4, 6-3, 7-5 Solana Sierra (ARG) d. Katie Boulter (GBR) 6-7(7), 6-2, 6-1 Taylor Fritz (USA) d. html:
Wimbledon

Alcaraz advances, Fritz survives in five

July 02, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Wimbledon main-draw action runs until 13 July. By ATP Staff

Wimbledon continued on Wednesday when Carlos Alcaraz continued his quest for a three-peat at the grass-court major. The Spaniard ousted Briton Oliver Tarvet, ending the qualifier's dream run.

Fifth seed Taylor Fritz overcame a big server for the second consecutive match, escaping Gabriel Diallo in five sets. Fritz's countryman Frances Tiafoe fell to Cameron Norrie in four sets.

View some of Wednesday's key results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores.

Centre Court
Aryna Sabalenka d. Marie Bouzkova (CZE) 7-6(4), 6-4
Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d. Oliver Tarvet (GBR) 6-1, 6-4, 6-4
Emma Raducanu (GBR) d. Marketa Vondrousova (CZE) 6-3, 6-3

No. 1 Court
Cameron Norrie (GBR) d. Frances Tiafoe (USA) 4-6, 6-4, 6-3, 7-5
Solana Sierra (ARG) d. Katie Boulter (GBR) 6-7(7), 6-2, 6-1
Taylor Fritz (USA) d. Gabriel Diallo (CAN) 3-6, 6-3, 7-6(0), 4-6, 6-3

 109 games later, Fritz reaches third round
After four years away, Cilic ready to meet Draper challenge
